content: linen stitch works up a nice flat fabric perfect for coasters these knit up in a short amount of time and use a small yardage use up scraps of cotton and multiple colors for some beautiful results i recommend using cotton for its super absorbent qualities these coasters will keep condensation and temperature changes from damaging your furniture materials worsted weight cotton yarn size 4mm us 6 needles tapestry needle for sewing in ends abbreviations k knit p purl rs right side ws wrong side slip all slip stitches purl wise pattern cast on 20 stitches or any even number of stitches using the long- tail cast on row 1 ws slip 1 *purl 1 move yarn to back slip 1 bring yarn back to front purl 1 repeat from * to end turn row 2 rs slip 1 *knit 1 bring yarn to front slip 1 move yarn back to back knit 1 repeat from * to end turn continue working row 1 and 2 for a total of 33 row or until square if you want to do two or more colors i recommend starting a new color on row 2 work a rs and a ws row then switch colors for two colors you can easily carry the other color up the side of the work finishing bind off all stitches weave in ends and start using your new coaster make matching sets or a different color for everyone knitsbywest etsy com - ravelry name aleknit all images and text © knits by west 2019
